game.name: Solaro
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Use the forces of the universe to explore a mysterious world of puzzles, secrets, and epic trials. Solaro is a minimalist open-world puzzle-adventure game created by a solo developer.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Use the forces of the universe to explore a mysterious world of puzzles, secrets, and epic trials. Solaro is a minimalist open-world puzzle-adventure game created by a solo developer.
